item.title: J Bostron - Live on Kool London dot com 26-06-08
item.description: J Bostron - Ruling Champion Radio show - live on www.koollondon.com - 26-06-08 Finest Ragga Jungle/Dubwise/Jumpup Mix'n'Blend Alternate Download Link : http://junglistradio.info/mixes/new/J_Bostron_-_www.koollondon.com_26-06-2008.mp3 00. J Bostron - Intro 01. DJ Drifta - Youts Today (Dub) 02. Paulie Walnuts - Kingston Town (Dub) 03. Diamond Geezer - Nah Pop it Off (Dub) 04. Paulie Walnuts - What You Looking At? (Dub) 05. M.I.R. Crew - Children of Dub (JungleXpeditions 08) 06. Ini Kimoze - Jump 4 Jah (Meatworks remix) 07. Million Styles - Fade away (Boj Lucki & LJudas remix) (MIR Records) 08. J Bostron - Rude Boy Jamaican (Exclusive Dub) 09. DJ Hose - Runaway (JungleXpeditions 08) 10. Babylon Demolitionist - So Divine (Dj4norml www.dj4norml.org) 11. D.I.S. feat. Demolition Man - Jungle Buss (Exclusive Unreleased Dub) 12. DJ Viper - Make it Funky (Dub) 13. DJ Fishstix - Bad Fkin Man (Exclusive Dub) 14. DJ Pleasure - Colt 45 (Bluprint 007) 15. Demolition Rollers - Except rand and bound (Full Vocal mix) (Dub) 16. Soundclash - The Filth (XS Records) 17. Erbalist & Locked feat. Mikey Dangerous - Shudn't War with We (Humble 004) 18. Zero G - Justice (XS) 19. Benny Page - Turn Down The Lights (Digital Soundboy 003) 20. Modified Motion - Soundkilla (XS) 21. Erbalist & Locked - The Delorean (Humble 004) www.junglex.ca 22. DJ Pleasure - Splinters in your Mind (Calypso Muzak) 23. Micky Finn & Erb N Dub - Attention (Finn People) 24. Smelly Fingaz - Chicks on Crack (Dub) 25. Chowder - Dead Man Walking (Dirty Needle) 26. DJ Pleasure - The Wizard (Bluprint 007) 27. Aesthetics - Warning VIP (Dub) 28. Micky Finn & Erb N Dub - My Dog 29. Jah Condah - Babylon System (Audio Bullet 001) J BOSTRON presents : Ruling Champion Radio Show Thursdays 9pm - 11pm UK London 10pm - 12pm CET Europe 12am - 2am Moscow 4pm - 6pm East US/Canada 1pm - 3pm West US/Canada 5am - 7am Hong Kong (friday am) 7am - 9 am Sydney (friday am) on KOOL LONDON - http://www.koollondon.com/ http://www.myspace.com/djbostron http://www.myspace.com/audiobulletrec http://www.myspace.com/humfidrum http://www.junglex.ca http://www.koollondon.com http://onedrop.moonfruit.com/ http://jbostron.podOmatic.com/
